cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 10 miles WSW of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward along the U.S. Mid-Atlantic coast and then toward Nova Scotia
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Nova Scotia, Canada (as a post-tropical cyclone)

weather_observation.watch_coast: No watches posted for the Florida east coast.
weather_observation.warning_coast: No warnings posted for the Florida east coast.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Primary impacts confined to North Carolina through Atlantic Canada; Florida east coast only experiencing long-period swells.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Long-period swells and rip currents will continue along the southeast Florida beaches, but operational impact inside the port basin is minimal.
